translation.welcomeText: Login or create a Camtougo account
translation.about: Here is all the text that tells us about camtougo. The business, the objectives, the confidentiality agreements and many other things. Simply by reading this text you will understand everything about Camtougo

translation.registerSuccess: Oh! check your mailbox. If you haven't received any messages then the email address and/or username has already been chosen
translation.traject1: Yaound√©, often called Ongola in Beti, the language of the indigenous ethnic group, the 'city of seven hills', is the political capital of Cameroon. With a population of 4,100,000 in 2019, it is, along with Douala, the most populous city in the country and in the CEMAC zone.
translation.traject2: Bafoussam, Fussap in Bamileke languages, is a city in Cameroon, capital of the Mifi department and of the West region. It has the status of an urban community since 2008, consisting of three district municipalities.
translation.traject3: Buea is a city in English-speaking Cameroon, capital of the South West region. Former capital of German Kamerun (1901-1914) and British Cameroon (1949-1961), it is located in the department of Fako at an altitude of 1,000 m at the foot of Mount Cameroon, an active volcano.
translation.carMoreDetails: Please give more details about the vehicle.
translation.PlaceMoreDetails: Please give more details on the exact location of departure.
translation.travelErrorDetails: Please make sure that you have filled in the fields correctly.
translation.travelSuccessDetails: CONGRATULATIONS! Your service is now available on the platform. You will be notified after each reservation. Please stay connected to confirm each reservation in time!
